00020 // To the LRM writer : this class is purely an artifact of the implementation.
00021 //
00022 
00023 #ifndef CIRCULAR_BUFFER_HEADER
00024 #define CIRCULAR_BUFFER_HEADER
00025 
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 
00028 using std::cout;
00029 using std::endl;
00030 
00031 template < typename T >
00032 class circular_buffer
00033 {
00034 public:
00035   circular_buffer( int size );
00036 
00037   circular_buffer<T> &operator=( const circular_buffer<T> & ); 
00038 
00039   ~circular_buffer() { delete [] m_buf; }
00040   
00041   void resize( int size );
00042 
00043   const T &read();
00044   void write( const T & );
00045 
00046   bool is_empty() const { return used() == 0; }
00047   bool is_full() const { return free() == 0; }
00048 
00049   int size() const { return m_size; }
00050   int used() const { return m_used; }
00051   int free() const { return m_free; }
00052 
00053   T &write_data() { return m_buf[m_wi]; }
00054   const T &read_data() const { return m_buf[m_ri]; }
00055 
00056   const T &peek_data( int i ) const { return m_buf[(m_ri + i) % size()]; }
00057   T &poke_data( int i ) { return m_buf[(m_ri + i) % size()]; }
00058 
00059   void increment_write_pos( int i = 1 );
00060   void increment_read_pos( int i = 1 );
00061 
00062   void init();
00063 
00064   void debug() const;
00065 
00066 private:
00067   circular_buffer( const circular_buffer<T> &b ); // disabled
00068   void copy( const circular_buffer<T> &b );
00069 
00070 private:
00071   int m_size;                   // size of the buffer
00072   T*  m_buf;                    // the buffer
00073   int m_free;                   // number of free spaces
00074   int m_used;                   // number of used spaces
00075   int m_ri;                     // index of next read
00076   int m_wi;                     // index of next write
00077   
00078 };
00079 
00080 template< typename T >
00081 void
00082 circular_buffer<T>::debug() const
00083 {
00084 
00085   cout << "Buffer debug" << endl;
00086   cout << "Size : " << size() << endl;
00087   cout << "Free/Used " << free() << "/" << used() << endl;
00088   cout << "Indeces : r/w = " << m_ri << "/" << m_wi << endl;
00089 
00090   if( is_empty() ) {
00091 
00092     cout << "empty" << endl;
00093 
00094   }
00095 
00096   if( is_full() ) {
00097 
00098     cout << "full" << endl;
00099 
00100   }
00101 
00102   cout << "Data : " << endl;
00103   for( int i = 0; i < used(); i++ ) {
00104 
00105     cout << peek_data( i ) << endl;
00106 
00107   }
00108 
00109 
00110 }
00111 
00112 template < typename T >
00113 circular_buffer<T>::
00114 circular_buffer( int size ) {
00115 
00116   m_size = size;
00117   m_buf = new T[m_size];
00118 
00119   init();
00120 
00121 }
00122  
00123 template < typename T >
00124 circular_buffer<T> &
00125 circular_buffer<T>::operator=( const circular_buffer<T> &b ) {
00126 
00127   init();
00128 
00129   for( int i = 0; i < size() && i < b.used(); i++ ) {
00130 
00131     write( b.peek_data( i ) );
00132 
00133   }
00134 
00135   return *this;
00136   
00137 }
00138 
00139 template < typename T >
00140 void
00141 circular_buffer<T>::resize( int size )
00142 {
00143 
00144   int i;
00145   T *new_buf = new T[size];
00146 
00147   for( i = 0; i < size && i < used(); i++ ) {
00148 
00149     new_buf[i] = peek_data( i );
00150 
00151   }
00152 
00153   delete [] m_buf;
00154 
00155   m_size = size;
00156   m_ri = 0;
00157   m_wi = i % m_size;
00158   m_used = i;
00159   m_free = m_size - m_used;
00160   
00161   m_buf = new_buf;
00162 
00163 }
00164  
00165 
00166 template < typename T >
00167 void
00168 circular_buffer<T>::init() {
00169 
00170   m_free = m_size;
00171   m_used = 0;
00172   m_ri = 0;
00173   m_wi = 0;
00174 
00175 }
00176 
00177 template < typename T >
00178 void
00179 circular_buffer<T>::copy( const circular_buffer<T> &b )
00180 {
00181 
00182   m_size = b.m_size;   // size of the buffer
00183   m_buf = b.m_buf;     // the buffer
00184   m_free = b.m_free;   // number of free spaces
00185   m_used = b.m_used;   // number of used spaces
00186   m_ri = b.m_ri;       // index of next read
00187   m_wi = b.m_wi;       // index of next write  
00188 
00189 }
00190 
00191 template < typename T >
00192 const T &
00193 circular_buffer<T>::read()
00194 {
00195 
00196   const T &t = read_data();
00197 
00198   increment_read_pos();
00199 
00200   return t;
00201 
00202 }
00203 
00204 template < typename T >
00205 void
00206 circular_buffer<T>::write( const T &t )
00207 {
00208 
00209   write_data() = t;
00210   increment_write_pos();
00211 
00212 }
00213 
00214 
00215 template < typename T >
00216 void
00217 circular_buffer<T>::increment_write_pos( int i ) {
00218 
00219   m_wi = ( m_wi + i ) % m_size;
00220   m_used += i;
00221   m_free -= i;
00222   
00223 }
00224 
00225 template < typename T >
00226 void
00227 circular_buffer<T>::increment_read_pos( int i ) {
00228 
00229   m_ri = ( m_ri + i ) % m_size;
00230   m_used -= i;
00231   m_free += i;
00232   
00233 }

00235 #endif
